novel loss function.from sentence: a novel loss function , namely the Wing loss , which is designed to improve the deep neural network training capability for small and medium range errors .

data augmentation strategy.from sentence: a data augmentation strategy , i.e. pose - based data balancing , that compensates the low frequency of occurrence of samples with large out - of - plane head rotations in the training set .

two - stage facial landmark localisation.from sentence: a two - stage facial landmark localisation framework for performance boosting .
